content: May 2 (OPTA) - Results and fixtures for the Premier League on Tuesday (start times are BST) Arsenal (3) 3 Chelsea (0) 1 Wednesday, May 3 fixtures (BST/GMT) Liverpool v Fulham (2000/1900) Manchester City v West Ham United (2000/1900) Thursday, May 4 fixtures (BST/GMT) Brighton &amp; Hove Albion v Manchester United (2000/1900) Saturday, May 6 fixtures (BST/GMT) AFC Bournemouth v Chelsea (1500/1400) Manchester City v Leeds United (1500/1400) Tottenham Hotspur v Crystal Palace (1500/1400) Wolverhampton Wanderers v Aston Villa (1500/1400) Liverpool v Brentford (1730/1630) Sunday, May 7 fixtures (BST/GMT) Newcastle United v Arsenal (1630/1530) West Ham United v Manchester United (1900/1800)
